body:
So, I just got the Prestige 2 in Nebula, so to celebrate this, me and my team decided to make a 1v1 tourney, hosted in the Fancy Soldiers server, there will be 30 players (If we dont get them, just 25 or 20) that will 1 v 1 in 3 fights per round.
One Bronze match will be made too.


How to apply?:
IGN:
E-Mail:
PvP Skills (I just wanna know)

The list will be ready when Ill make another post about this:
http://challonge.com/kingofthefallen
